xal.extension.twissobserver

Interface CsFixedPtEstimator.IProgressListener

  • Enclosing class:
    CsFixedPtEstimator

    public static interface CsFixedPtEstimator.IProgressListener
    Interface defining the methods to implement for a class that wishes to monitor the progress of solution computation.
    Since:
    Oct 2, 2014

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void iterationUpdate(int cntIter, double dblAlpha, double dblError)
      Notifies the listener of the residual error at the current iteration.
      void searchComplete(CovarianceMatrix matRecon)
      Signals the listener object that the search has terminated and provides the covariance matrix where the search stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • iterationUpdate

        void iterationUpdate(int cntIter,
                     double dblAlpha,
                     double dblError)
        Notifies the listener of the residual error at the current iteration. Thus, this method is fired at every iteration. Note that the tuning parameter α is dynamic, its value changes throughout the iteration based upon an algorithm for stabilizing the convergence.
        Parameters:
        cntIter - the current iteration count
        dblError - the residual solution error at the current iteration
        dblAlpha - the current tuning parameter value
        Since:
        Oct 2, 2014

      • searchComplete

        void searchComplete(CovarianceMatrix matRecon)
        Signals the listener object that the search has terminated and provides the covariance matrix where the search stopped. It is up to the listener to check the error tolerance and iteration count to determine whether or not the given covariance matrix is acceptable.
        Parameters:
        matRecon - the covariance matrix where the search ended.
        Since:
        Oct 23, 2014
